content:
If you're a tweeter, please retweet this! https://twitter.com/ePatientDave/status/1189558332345991169

(And read the post that it links to, of course.)

If you're on LinkedIn, please like/share this: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/epatientdave_fhir-devdays-announces-patient-innovator-activity-6595325296138862592-XzfH

I don't do Facebook, but you're welcome to post about it there of course.

#HL7 #FHIR #DevDays announces the four Patient Innovator finalists! @Seqster @TheOrigBigScary @johnkeyes #Foundation29 https://www.epatientdave.com/2019/10/30/fhir-devdays-announces-patient-innovator-track-finalists-two-companies-two-patients/

- Dave deBronkart (@ePatientDave)
